articles.description: Nasa in 2019 credited Chennai's Shanmuga Subramanian for locating the debris of Vikram lander.  | Latest News India
articles.content: A month after Vikram lander hard landed on the moon's surface in 2019, Chennai's engineer Shanmuga Subramanian helped locate the debris and hit the headlines as Nasa credited him for finding Vikram l… [+1873 chars]
